definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: Chitosan is the N- deacetylated derivative of chitin.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖是几丁质的脱乙酰基衍生物。

sentences.english: The compatibility between tenocyte and terylene was poor.
sentences.chinese: 腱细胞与涤纶的相容性较差，在几丁质上无细胞附着。

sentences.english: Chitin and it's derivatives have very important effect on wound healing.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质及其衍生物对创面的愈合有重要作用。

sentences.english: The emphasis was laid on the review of production capability of chitinase by microbes.
sentences.chinese: 着重论述了提高微生物产几丁质酶能力的方法。

sentences.english: Chitosan is a polysaccharide composed of D-glucosamine and N-acetyl-D-glucosamine.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖是由几丁质脱乙酰化而得到的衍生物。

sentences.english: Chitinases, which can hydrolyze chitin, occur in a wide range of microorganisms including viruses, bacteria and fungi.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶可以降解几丁质，广泛存在于各类微生物中。

sentences.english: Chitinases, which can hydrolyze chitin, occur in a wide range of microorganisms including viruses, bacteria and fungi.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶可以降解几丁质，广泛存在于各类微生物中。

sentences.english: The exoskeleton of insects is largely made of protein and chitin.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的外骨骼大部分是由蛋白质和几丁质组成的。

sentences.english: Trichoderma chitinases are diversified both in structures and in coding genes.
sentences.chinese: 木霉菌的几丁质酶具有结构和编码基因多样性。

sentences.english: Chitinase and its substrate (chitin) universally exist in nature.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶及其底物几丁质均广泛存在于自然界。

sentences.english: Chitinase and its substrate (chitin) universally exist in nature.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶及其底物几丁质均广泛存在于自然界。

sentences.english: The soluble 21 peptide was purified by using chitin affinity chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 经几丁质亲和层析柱纯化21肽。

sentences.english: Chitin inhibited the growth of either cells.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质明显抑制这两种细胞生长。

sentences.english: The structure of chitin is similar to that of bacterial cell wall peptidoglycan .
sentences.chinese: 几丁质的结构和细菌细胞壁肽聚糖的结构相似。

sentences.english: Chitinases are one of hot points in plant genetic engineers of fungal resistance.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶是植物抗真菌基因工程的热点之一。

sentences.english: Chitinase has a important role when pathogenetic fungi infected insects.
sentences.chinese: 几丁质酶在昆虫病原真菌的入侵中有重要作用。

definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
